title: BlackRock’s Rick Rieder surges ahead in race to chair Federal Reserve
description: Donald Trump has said he plans to name his nominee to run the US central bank ‘in the not too distant future’
content: Donald Trump has said he plans to name his nominee to run the US central bank ‘in the not too distant future’
